## ouroctl set context

Switch to a different configuration context

### Synopsis

Switch the active context to use a different OuroPlatform instance or authentication configuration.
Each context defines an API endpoint and authentication settings.

```
ouroctl set context [context-name] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for context
```

### SEE ALSO

* [ouroctl set](ouroctl_set.md)	 - Configure ouroctl settings
